pr_title: DHFPROD-5366: Hovering over custom step edit icon should have a toolt…

timeline.bodyText: can you pls fix the name to match the selector used. getAll* should be named getAll
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText:
Since we have added these here, I think we should use them in custom-card.tsx as well.
So replace hard coded 'View' and 'Settings' with AdvCustomTooltips.viewCustom and AdvCustomTooltips.settings respectively.
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5366: Hovering over custom step edit icon should have a tooltip as view
DHFPROD-5366: Hovering over custom step edit icon should have a tooltip as view
